EmailTemplate.subject: BSKL - Book sale information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
To coincide with World Book Day on Thursday 7 March, there will be a book sale at BSKL on Thursday from 8.30am-4.30pm. Children will be given the opportunity to visit the sale during class and break times. There will be 2 vendors on the day. Roving Books will have books for younger readers up to primary school and books will cost between RM 5-30. Real Books will have books for upper primary to middle school and books will cost between RM 20-50.
Reading has many benefits for children including: • bonding time when parents and children read together • it fuels imagination and creativity • promotes longer attention span • helps to improve vocabulary • it's fun and relaxing Your help in promoting the love of reading to your children is much appreciated. Please buy a book or two, or three!
Yvonne Bowyer Librarian
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
